Text: Kiss Me Goodbye (film):  It is a remake of "Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands" ("Dona Flor e Seus Dois Maridos" in Portuguese), a 1976 Brazilian film starring Sonia Braga based on the book of the same name by Jorge Amado.
